name: Airbility, Inc.
description: Developer of high-speed electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft featuring distributed fanjet systems and modular hybrid power systems, allowing safe and quiet medium to long-range transportation.
one_liner: Developer of high-speed electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft featuring distributed fanjet systems and modular hybrid power systems, allowing safe and quiet medium to long-range transportation.

name: APX Solutions Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a cloud freight consolidator platform intended to optimize business operations. The company's platform specializes in offering services including admin control, order management, shipment processing, dispatch management, and route optimization, enabling businesses to automate manual tasks and improve supply chain efficiency and profitability.
one_liner: Operator of a cloud freight consolidator platform intended to optimize business operations. The company's platform specializes in offering services including admin control, order management, shipment processing, dispatch management, and route optimization, enabling businesses to automate manual tasks and improve supply chain efficiency and profitability.

name: Avision, Inc.
description: Developer of an unmanned aerial navigation platform designed to control the communication and navigation of robots and drones. The company's platform is comprised of air traffic control software, drone built-in hardware components, and an integration API that automatically regulates traffic for all UAVs connected to it, enabling aerial industries to manage any number of drones with business applications ranging from entertainment to enterprise logistics.
one_liner: Developer of an unmanned aerial navigation platform designed to control the communication and navigation of robots and drones. The company's platform is comprised of air traffic control software, drone built-in hardware components, and an integration API that automatically regulates traffic for all UAVs connected to it, enabling aerial industries to manage any number of drones with business applications ranging from entertainment to enterprise logistics.

name: Breadfast, Inc.
description: Developer of a grocery delivery application designed to change the way household goods are delivered. The company delivers fresh bread, milk, eggs, laundry detergents, baby products, and personal care kits to the customers at their doorstep, providing them with a one-stop platform for their daily needs.
one_liner: Developer of a grocery delivery application designed to change the way household goods are delivered. The company delivers fresh bread, milk, eggs, laundry detergents, baby products, and personal care kits to the customers at their doorstep, providing them with a one-stop platform for their daily needs.

name: Cabify, Inc.
description: Provider of on-demand transportation services intended to promote mobility in cities. The company's services offer clean, modern cars with added features including a choice of music, magazines, and water, among others, driven by hand-picked and specially trained drivers, enabling commuters with affordable, safe, and reliable rides wherever required.
one_liner: Provider of on-demand transportation services intended to promote mobility in cities. The company's services offer clean, modern cars with added features including a choice of music, magazines, and water, among others, driven by hand-picked and specially trained drivers, enabling commuters with affordable, safe, and reliable rides wherever required.

name: GLOBAL CAR GROUP PTE. LTD.
description: Operator of an online automotive marketplace intended to simplify the sale of used vehicles. The company's platform allows owners to book an appointment for inspection, prices vehicles based on AI algorithms and uses data to determine which car would give the new owner the least trouble, enabling customers to buy and sell their car seamlessly in a secure and efficient manner.
one_liner: Operator of an online automotive marketplace intended to simplify the sale of used vehicles. The company's platform allows owners to book an appointment for inspection, prices vehicles based on AI algorithms and uses data to determine which car would give the new owner the least trouble, enabling customers to buy and sell their car seamlessly in a secure and efficient manner.

name: Carsome Group Inc.
description: Operator of an online car-selling platform intended to connect customers to used car dealers. The company offers a range of services that include car inspection, ownership transfer to financing as well as offers a curated selection of cars to individuals who wish to buy pre-owned cars, enabling customers to sell cars within a day with no fee and no hassle.
one_liner: Operator of an online car-selling platform intended to connect customers to used car dealers. The company offers a range of services that include car inspection, ownership transfer to financing as well as offers a curated selection of cars to individuals who wish to buy pre-owned cars, enabling customers to sell cars within a day with no fee and no hassle.

name: CarSwitch Ltd.
description: Operator of an online car marketplace intended to assist in the transaction of used cars. The company's marketplace inspects, warrants, photographs, advertises, collects calls, filters prospective buyers, attends test drives, and handles paperwork, enabling users to easily buy old cars and avail insurance, financing, and transfer ownership.
one_liner: Operator of an online car marketplace intended to assist in the transaction of used cars. The company's marketplace inspects, warrants, photographs, advertises, collects calls, filters prospective buyers, attends test drives, and handles paperwork, enabling users to easily buy old cars and avail insurance, financing, and transfer ownership.

name: Bryng.me Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a corporate food management platform intended to provide meal plans for employees. The company provides employee meal plans, and special event and pantry management services, allowing businesses to easily and cost-effectively manage all of their employee, client, and event food needs via one portal.
one_liner: Developer of a corporate food management platform intended to provide meal plans for employees. The company provides employee meal plans, and special event and pantry management services, allowing businesses to easily and cost-effectively manage all of their employee, client, and event food needs via one portal.

name: Drivemate Company Limited
description: Developer of an online car rental platform designed to reduce the wastage of fuel and positively impact sustainable development. The company's platform is a peer-to-peer car-sharing marketplace that connects vehicle owners with renters who can choose cars based on features like car variety and easy pick-up, without any hidden charges, enabling car owners to generate income from unlimited car rentals and renters to find cars nearby from where they live to travel conveniently.
one_liner: Developer of an online car rental platform designed to reduce the wastage of fuel and positively impact sustainable development. The company's platform is a peer-to-peer car-sharing marketplace that connects vehicle owners with renters who can choose cars based on features like car variety and easy pick-up, without any hidden charges, enabling car owners to generate income from unlimited car rentals and renters to find cars nearby from where they live to travel conveniently.

name: Esar Inc.
description: Developer of a car rental platform designed to provide a peer-to-peer car rental service. The company's platform connect and allow community members to rent unique fully insured cars that suit their needs as per their choice of color, and specifications along with complete comfort, and safety, enabling users to fulfill their transportation needs.
one_liner: Developer of a car rental platform designed to provide a peer-to-peer car rental service. The company's platform connect and allow community members to rent unique fully insured cars that suit their needs as per their choice of color, and specifications along with complete comfort, and safety, enabling users to fulfill their transportation needs.

name: Goldbelly, Inc.
description: Operator of a specialty food online marketplace intended to make local, artisan products available to anyone and anywhere. The company offers logistics, providing the boxes and cold packs for shipping orders and helping restaurants ship directly from their premises, with tools for ordering and doorstep delivery, enabling small businesses to reach new customers and grow their revenue.
one_liner: Operator of a specialty food online marketplace intended to make local, artisan products available to anyone and anywhere. The company offers logistics, providing the boxes and cold packs for shipping orders and helping restaurants ship directly from their premises, with tools for ordering and doorstep delivery, enabling small businesses to reach new customers and grow their revenue.

name: Cheetah X, Inc.
description: Provider of an electronic scooter-sharing service intended to help users travel within cities. The company's scooters are capable of going up to twenty-five mph and a full day on a single charge, enabling customers to travel locally in a faster, cheaper, and environmentally friendly manner.
one_liner: Provider of an electronic scooter-sharing service intended to help users travel within cities. The company's scooters are capable of going up to twenty-five mph and a full day on a single charge, enabling customers to travel locally in a faster, cheaper, and environmentally friendly manner.

name: Grab Inc
description: Founded in 2012, Grab provides ride-sharing services, food and grocery delivery, and financial services (payments, consumer loans, and enterprise offerings) in eight Southeast-Asian countries through its mobile platform. The company partners with merchants and riders, connecting them with consumers while charging commission to both sides. Grab has a leading market share in and derives 89% of its revenue from its core businesses, ride-sharing and food delivery. Singapore and Malaysia contributed 58% of revenue as of end-2021. Grab's main competitors in Southeast Asia are Foodpanda and Gojek, the ride-sharing arm of GoTo. Its financial services business is still in its nascent stage and provides minimal revenue currently. The company now also generates advertising revenue.
one_liner: Founded in 2012, Grab provides ride-sharing services, food and grocery delivery, and financial services (payments, consumer loans, and enterprise offerings) in eight Southeast-Asian countries through its mobile platform. The company partners with merchants and riders, connecting them with consumers while charging commission to both sides. Grab has a leading market share in and derives 89% of its revenue from its core businesses, ride-sharing and food delivery. Singapore and Malaysia contributed 58% of revenue as of end-2021. Grab's main competitors in Southeast Asia are Foodpanda and Gojek, the ride-sharing arm of GoTo. Its financial services business is still in its nascent stage and provides minimal revenue currently. The company now also generates advertising revenue.

name: iCart Group Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of an online grocery service designed for an easy grocery shopping experience. The company helps to shop all products from local grocery stores around the city to deliver a simplified life, enabling customers to purchase groceries without having to worry about their freshness.
one_liner: Operator of an online grocery service designed for an easy grocery shopping experience. The company helps to shop all products from local grocery stores around the city to deliver a simplified life, enabling customers to purchase groceries without having to worry about their freshness.

name: Invygo Limited
description: Developer of a car subscription platform designed to get a car and pay every month and return or upgrade whenever possible without penalties. The company's platform helps users to subscribe and return cars with ease, as well as browse and drive fully insured cars with one payment that includes maintenance, breakdown cover, and concierge assistance, enabling customers to get automobile assistance simply.
one_liner: Developer of a car subscription platform designed to get a car and pay every month and return or upgrade whenever possible without penalties. The company's platform helps users to subscribe and return cars with ease, as well as browse and drive fully insured cars with one payment that includes maintenance, breakdown cover, and concierge assistance, enabling customers to get automobile assistance simply.

name: Joy for Business Services Holdings Limited
description: Operator of a car servicing platform intended to offer car maintenance services. The company offers various services such as tire changes, oil changes, battery replacement, car wash, detailing and roadside assistance, enabling customers to get provided with all types of services in the comfort of their homes.
one_liner: Operator of a car servicing platform intended to offer car maintenance services. The company offers various services such as tire changes, oil changes, battery replacement, car wash, detailing and roadside assistance, enabling customers to get provided with all types of services in the comfort of their homes.

name: DoLightful, Inc.
description: Operator of the ridesharing platform intended to help parents schedule rides and childcare for kids. The company offers to schedule a ride, childcare, or both and provides background-checked, fingerprinted caregivers who are trained to transport kids along with real-time updates and tracking of driver location, enabling parents and schools to book safe rides and childcare for children without hassle.
one_liner: Operator of the ridesharing platform intended to help parents schedule rides and childcare for kids. name: MisMar
description: Connecting car owners with service providers to manage their maintenance, repairs and spare parts needs.
one_liner: Connecting car owners with service providers to manage their maintenance, repairs and spare parts needs.

name: Neuron Mobility Holdings Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a rental e-scooter platform designed to provide safe and convenient inner-city transport. The company's platform offers e-scooters that combine real-time telematics to address personal mobility in daily urban commuting, goods delivery, and tourist segments, enabling citizens to have safe, comfortable, and affordable transport for short-distance travel.
one_liner: Developer of a rental e-scooter platform designed to provide safe and convenient inner-city transport. The company's platform offers e-scooters that combine real-time telematics to address personal mobility in daily urban commuting, goods delivery, and tourist segments, enabling citizens to have safe, comfortable, and affordable transport for short-distance travel.

name: Rabbit Mobility
description: Developer of an application designed to create a proper urban living for Egyptians by providing eco-friendly alternatives for short-distance transportation. The company's application offers e-scooter, standard bicycles, a day-rental option and flexible leasing timelines, enabling users to rent scooters by the minute and to commute from one place to another.
one_liner: Developer of an application designed to create a proper urban living for Egyptians by providing eco-friendly alternatives for short-distance transportation. The company's application offers e-scooter, standard bicycles, a day-rental option and flexible leasing timelines, enabling users to rent scooters by the minute and to commute from one place to another.

name: Riide, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of single-speed electric bikes designed for urban transportation. The company designs electric bikes and sells them as a subscription service that is lightweight, nearly silent to operate, and well-balanced, as well as offers add-on services like unlimited maintenance, theft insurance, and a lock, enabling users to commute without traffic, parking, or congestion.
one_liner: Manufacturer of single-speed electric bikes designed for urban transportation. The company designs electric bikes and sells them as a subscription service that is lightweight, nearly silent to operate, and well-balanced, as well as offers add-on services like unlimited maintenance, theft insurance, and a lock, enabling users to commute without traffic, parking, or congestion.

name: Sleek EV Pte Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of electric scooters designed for urban riding and create a world where green vehicles become the new standard. The company's scooters utilize motors with field-oriented control, ensuring power optimization and maximum acceleration and removable batteries that can be charged in-bike or via sockets, enabling users to travel efficiently and sustainably.
one_liner: Manufacturer of electric scooters designed for urban riding and create a world where green vehicles become the new standard. The company's scooters utilize motors with field-oriented control, ensuring power optimization and maximum acceleration and removable batteries that can be charged in-bike or via sockets, enabling users to travel efficiently and sustainably.

name: Telgani Holding Limited
description: Developer of a car rental platform intended to help users rent their desired cars. The company's platform allows users to pick the car and the location they want to travel to and provides options for nearby providers to compare and book car rides, enabling customers to rent cars at competitive prices.

The company's platform allows users to pick the car and the location they want to travel to and provides options for nearby providers to compare and book car rides, enabling customers to rent cars at competitive prices.

name: Upshift, Inc.
description: Fractional car subscription for people who don't need a car every day
one_liner: Fractional car subscription for people who don't need a car every day

name: Visionful Holding, Inc.
description: Developer of monitoring and management system designed to connect the parking and curbsides data with autonomous vehicles. The company's system provides businesses with information for parking guidance, parking enforcement and transportation analytics in real-time for smart cities, enabling clients to automate parking and transportation management
one_liner: Developer of monitoring and management system designed to connect the parking and curbsides data with autonomous vehicles. name: Whill, Inc.
description: Developer of an intelligent personal electric vehicle designed to deliver fun and innovative mobility for all. The company connects the world with personal transportation solutions, in addition to designing and selling mobility vehicles it provides mobility-as-a-service, offering autonomous transportation services as well as on-site fleet and short-term rental services that make public spaces such as airports, hospitals, and vacation destinations more accessible, enabling customers to drive on public roads without the need for a driver's license and empowering wheelchair users to lead a liberating lifestyle.

The company connects the world with personal transportation solutions, in addition to designing and selling mobility vehicles it provides mobility-as-a-service, offering autonomous transportation services as well as on-site fleet and short-term rental services that make public spaces such as airports, hospitals, and vacation destinations more accessible, enabling customers to drive on public roads without the need for a driver's license and empowering wheelchair users to lead a liberating lifestyle.

name: Rever Moto, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile application designed to connect a global community of motorcycle enthusiasts. The company's application discovers the best places to ride, enabling motorcycle enthusiasts to record and track their rides and share their favorite roads and routes with other enthusiasts in the community easily.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application designed to connect a global community of motorcycle enthusiasts. The company's application discovers the best places to ride, enabling motorcycle enthusiasts to record and track their rides and share their favorite roads and routes with other enthusiasts in the community easily.

name: Payment24 Group Proprietary Limited
description: Provider of a fuel payment and fleet management system created for fleet management. The company's fleet management system integrates into gas stations and vehicles, enabling fleet owners and managers to reduce fraud and increase efficiencies.
one_liner: Provider of a fuel payment and fleet management system created for fleet management. The company's fleet management system integrates into gas stations and vehicles, enabling fleet owners and managers to reduce fraud and increase efficiencies.

name: Saucey Inc.
description: Provider of an on-demand alcohol delivery platform designed to offer a reliable way to shop for alcohol. The company's alcohol delivery platform offers the convenience of 30-minutes delivery, enabling consumers to purchase alcohol with higher frequency.
one_liner: Provider of an on-demand alcohol delivery platform designed to offer a reliable way to shop for alcohol. The company's alcohol delivery platform offers the convenience of 30-minutes delivery, enabling consumers to purchase alcohol with higher frequency.

name: Zesty, Inc
description: Provider of an on-demand food ordering application designed to offer food booking and delivery services. The company's application provides its restaurant partners with predictable, incremental revenue by leveraging their excess capacity and brand affinity as well as helps restaurants to reach a bigger audience, enabling consumers to order fresh meals from local restaurants.

The company's application provides its restaurant partners with predictable, incremental revenue by leveraging their excess capacity and brand affinity as well as helps restaurants to reach a bigger audience, enabling consumers to order fresh meals from local restaurants.

name: Lish Inc.
description: Provider of an on-demand food delivery platform. The company's on-demand food delivery platform connects busy people with local chefs enabling customers to discover and order healthy home cooked dinners and meals hand-made by local chefs delivered at their homes and place of work.
one_liner: Provider of an on-demand food delivery platform. The company's on-demand food delivery platform connects busy people with local chefs enabling customers to discover and order healthy home cooked dinners and meals hand-made by local chefs delivered at their homes and place of work.

name: Beeline Bikes, Inc.
description: Provider of an online mobile bike shop intended to reinvent how people interact with bike shops. The company's bike shop includes a technology platform, support infrastructure and supply chain, enabling customers to schedule a visit at the time and location of their choosing.
one_liner: Provider of an online mobile bike shop intended to reinvent how people interact with bike shops. The company's bike shop includes a technology platform, support infrastructure and supply chain, enabling customers to schedule a visit at the time and location of their choosing.

name: PT Dapur Berry Indonesia
description: Provider of an online catering service designed to provide food to the consumers at any location. The company's online catering service takes online orders for lunch boxes and bento meals, enabling consumers to order food from a varied range of delicious and healthy food menu.
one_liner: Provider of an online catering service designed to provide food to the consumers at any location. The company's online catering service takes online orders for lunch boxes and bento meals, enabling consumers to order food from a varied range of delicious and healthy food menu.

name: BB Technology Holding, Inc.
description: Provider of a peer-to-peer boat rental platform intended to offer boats available to everyone. The company's platform provides real time customer service support and insurance coverage, both in the U.S. and internationally, enabling renters and boat owners to provide the best concierge services easily.

name: BacklotCars, Inc.
description: Provider of a subscription based online wholesale marketplace for the wholesale auto industry designed to make buying wholesale easy, transparent and enjoyable. The company's wholesale marketplace provides direct access to true wholesale inventory from new car stores, enabling car dealers, auto finance companies and rental car companies to liquidate inventory direct to their end-market without having to go to physical auctions.
one_liner: Provider of a subscription based online wholesale marketplace for the wholesale auto industry designed to make buying wholesale easy, transparent and enjoyable. name: Grin, Inc.
description: Provider of electric skates intended to give people mobility along with fun. The company's skates connects people in a simple and ecological way, enabling them to help in reducing pollution.
